description: Agrocalidad in Ecuador oversees the regulation and control of organic production, established by a ministerial agreement in 2003 and formalized in 2013. It promotes sustainable production models, including organic, ecological, and agroecological practices. With over 2,300 certified organic products, Ecuador is a leading exporter to the European Union and the second globally. The initiative aims to enhance domestic consumption, ensure product integrity, and support producers through training and certification.
name: Agrocalidad
